::Shadow Wing::

She called to him again. "Veratis,it's me, Shadow Wing, can you hear 
me? I think that I can hear you inside my head, but I'm not asure. 
What's going on? I can....feel...again. Like I have control of my 
form, but I'm not sure." 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> 
> 
> 
> > Veratis was working on the results of some tests when he heard 
someone
> call
> > to him. "What?" he thought,"Who's there?" he looked around the 
room the
> only
> > two that he could see were him and the protoform of Shadow Wing.
